## Feature


### Maps

The reference of the maps of the country divisions is [National Cartographic Center](https://www.ncc.gov.ir/en/) 
and its last update is 2018.

- [X] Province (استان)
- [X] Country (شهرستان)
- [X] District (بخش)
- [X] Rural (دهستان)
- [X] City (شهر)
- [X] Features (عوارض طبیعی)

- province
- county
- district
- rural
- city
- iran_boundary
- iran_feature
- iran_border

```{r province}
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)
library(IRMaps)

map_ploter(province)
map_ploter(county)
map_ploter(district)
map_ploter(rural)
```
